name: One Fiend
description:
One Fiend is a game that exists for submission to RAION HackJam 2020. In this game, the player plays as a single Fiend, who wants to make peace with humankind after a long war with each other. Find the material to make a Scroll and give it to the king of the human. If he accepts it, peace for both sides will come to reconcile the world.

Game Poster: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Iz_5ySOmM4qCIAo1uGISJYUR-Muj7uT3/view?usp=shari...

Team Member:
Muhammad Haikal Fisabilillah - Designer

Ezra Reihardian Sihotang - Artist
